content.rendered:
As the end of the 2023-2024 academic year approaches, the district has finalized the end of the year calendar The last day of school for elementary and middle school students will be a full day on Friday, June 21. Additionally, due to the district not using any emergency weather days, there will be no school on Friday, June 7.  Please note the following dates:

Elementary & Middle School End of Academic Year Dates

  • May 24 & 27: Memorial Day Recess – No School 
  • June 7: Emergency Give Back Day – No School
  • June 19: Juneteenth – No School
  • June 21: Last day of classes for elementary school students (full day of school)

Grades 9-12 End of Academic Year Dates

  • May 24 & 27: Memorial Day Recess – No School
  • June 4: Algebra 1 Regents Exam – No school for students except for those taking the exam
  • June 7: Emergency Give Back Day – No School
  • June 13: Last day of regular instruction for high school students (full day of school)
  • June 14: Regents Exams begin
  • June 19: Juneteenth – No School
  • June 26: Graduation Day
